welcome_message_title: Welcome to Ban Pong Yaeng Nai
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ban Pong Yaeng Nai, the charming city known for its stunning natural beauty and rich cultural heritage. Get ready to immerse yourself in the local culture and indulge in the delicious cuisine. Explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chiang Mai International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Chiang Mai International Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport. However, the connection may be slow and unreliable at times.
